Injury: Signed by the Boston Bruins to a seven-year contract extension.
Signed as an unrestricted free agent by the Boston Bruins to a five-year contract.
Suspended by the NHL for one game.
NHL lockout: Signed with the Farjestad BK of the Elitserien Hockey League (Sweden).
Re-signed by the Ottawa Senators to a two-year contract.
Missed Game 6 and 7 of Round Two against Toronto (knee injury).
Acquired from the New York Islanders.
